TaskList.title: Code Review for Project X
TaskList.description: Review the latest pull requests and provide feedback to ensure code quality and adherence to standards.

TaskList.title: Update Product Documentation
TaskList.description: Revise the user manual and API documentation to reflect recent feature changes and improvements.

TaskList.title: Schedule Team Stand-Up Meeting
TaskList.description: Organize a weekly stand-up to discuss project progress, address blockers, and align on goals for the upcoming week.
